Text: The unicorns win. I think you could summerise this Horizon program as we don't know the answer but we have a lot of theories.

Hahaha

No we have garbage reality shows on National Geographic, TLC, Discover, and The History Channel


But this was a great video, thanks for posting it!

Unicorns always win



and plz don't mock god, he is watching you right now, you may get a laugh with your dumb jokes about noah's ark and unicorns but god knows about it, you're not fooling him ok! You're only fooling yourself.
@john6425 Anyone who considers Noah's Ark to be a historical event is already a joke. They don't need any help from us to be funny.

@john6425 You are spot on about NGC, Science & Discovery though. They're been outputting a whole bunch of crap for a while now. Truckers, idiots in junkyards, mechanics. It's a giant race to the bottom. TV producers love reality shows, they're cheap as shit to make because they don't have any actual content. They just find a group of bombastic dipshits and roll tape.

The BBC, however, has a load of good programming. And if you look at the credits of the decent shows on those other channels, most of the time they were originally made for and run on the Beeb.
